title: Unexpected error?
body:
So after this patch 7.11 was implemented, I really wanted to play a game, like a normal player, but guess what?  Problem at login screen...an unexpected error was occured...I did everything right, checked the repair tool x5 times, even re-installing the client twice ( waited for 6 hours for both installs) and still nothing, everything was fine until the patch come out, I was checking a Facebook Group of LOL which people say things about new champs, their plays, their division, and this problem...Of course not everyone had the same problem like me and many others but still...how? and why? I even tryed to made a ticket through the support call but nothing( tired to wait 30 minutes to send a ticket lol, and still sending...really?). I don't want to be mad, but someone can tell me what going on? When it can be fixed? I wasn't reported by anyone for hacking or something like that, I remember well...but really? If someone knows something please tell me. Thanks:))

P.S: Sorry if my english can be pretty hard, I'm from South East Europe and english is not my good call. I hope it's understandable to read, I hope.{{summoner:3}}

replies.body:
I appreciate your detailed info here, and your journey up to this point sounds pretty frustrating.  It sounds to me like you might have some kind of network block or issue that's failing to reach our services in and out of League.  To start off, I recommend grabbing our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to auto-configure your firewall settings in case that's the culprit, but you'll want to double check any antivirus you have too.

Once that's been configured, run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to both tune up your connection to us as well as remove any other blocks.  I hope that helps!

Man, thanks for sending me evertyhing to help, but I did evertyhing in order to work up, and still nothing, the same error, and about the ticket, still the same problem( it says the ticket is sending...but remains in this state forever)...I don't know what the problem is...and from what source it happens...But I will try to search anything and fix the problem by any means. Thanks for the tip and help.
ye was the same for me..... just triple check any anti virus n try resetting ur router... I did this n worked fine straight after

have the same problem it started friday and tried the hextech repair tool and uninstalling lol and reinstalling and i have had issues like this 
 for the last 4 patches
